page.title: 15CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: The following games are played: Kangarooso/Fox and Rabbits/Cops and Robbers/I sent a letter to my love/ Bike Tig/Line Tig/Elastics/Skipping/ Stick-in-the-mud/Fish-in-the-net/ Crocodile Tig/Doctor!Doctor!/Bar Tig/ Hop Scotch/Off Ground Tig. The most popular game with the boys is "Cops and Robbers".The most popular game with the girls is "Off Ground Tig"."Crocodile Tig" is like ordinary tig except that you have to stay on the climbing frame."Elastics" is played with a long piece of elastic knotted together and held out in a rectangle shape near the ground by two people standing inside it.A third person makes simple patterns with it by jumping over it.The elastic is raised as the patterns are completed.
